summary.span: 表示可用于呈现一组项的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种，可以包含多个项，例如字符串、 对象或其他元素。An is a type of that can contain multiple items, such as strings, objects, or other elements. 下图显示包含以下不同类型的项的控件：The following illustration shows a control that contains the following different types of items: - 一个字符串。A string. - 对象。A object. - 对象。A object. - A包含控件和。A control that contains an and a . ![使用四种类型的内容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "与四种类型的内容的 ListBox")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 包含多种类型对象的 ListBoxListBox that contains multiple types of objects 可以使用两种或属性来指定要用于生成的内容的集合你。Use either the or the property to specify the collection to use to generate the content of your . 你可以设置实现任何类型的属性。You can set the property to any type that implements . 通常用于显示一个数据集合，或者将绑定到集合对象。 is typically used to display a data collection or to bind an to a collection object. 如果您不想要使用的对象实现来填充，你可以使用添加项属性。If you do not want to use an object that implements to populate the , you can add items by using the property. 中的项可以具有不同的类型。The items in an can have different types. 例如，是一个字符串的一个项，并且另一个项可以包含。For example, a can contain one item that is a string and another item that is an . 当设置属性，集合设置为只读和固定大小。When the property is set, the collection is set to read-only and fixed-size. 这意味着，你无法将项添加到集合直接。This means that you cannot add items to the collection directly. 当正在使用，将属性设置为`null`移除集合并还原使用情况与，后者将是一个空。When is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to , which will be an empty . 每个类型都有相应的项容器类型。Each type has a corresponding item container type. 每个相应的项容器追加`Item`为其名称。The corresponding item container for each appends `Item` to its name. 例如，对于，项容器是控件; 有关，它们是控件。For example, for , the item containers are controls; for , they are controls. 你可以显式创建容器类型中每个项，但不需要。You can explicitly create a container type for each item in the , but it is not necessary. 当未显式创建的容器类型时，将生成一个包含项集合中的数据项目。When you do not explicitly create the container type, one is generated that contains a data item in the item collection. 例如，如果将绑定到字符串对象的集合属性，未显式创建对象，但将生成一个用于每个字符串。For example, if you bind a collection of string objects to the property of a , you do not explicitly create objects, but the will generate one for each string. 你可以通过使用访问生成的项容器属性。You can access a generated item container by using the property. > [!NOTE] > UI 自动化的某些功能无法正常工作时包含重复的对象。Certain features of UI Automation do not work correctly when an contains duplicate objects. 如果对象在出现多次，仅第一个实例将出现在自动化树中。If an object appears multiple times, only the first instance appears in the automation tree. (两个对象**x**和**y**被视为重复如果`Object.Equals(x, y)`返回`true`。)(Two objects **x** and **y** are considered to be duplicates if `Object.Equals(x, y)` returns `true`.) > > 尽管对象**x**正在使用返回的值**x。**`GetHashCode()`While an object **x** is in use by an the value returned by **x.**`GetHashCode()` 不得更改。must not change. 对此值进行更改不受支持，并可能导致不可预知的行为。Changes to this value are unsupported, and lead to unpredictable behavior. 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示将数据绑定到。The following examples demonstrate binding data to an . 第一个示例创建一个名为类`MyData`，它是一个简单字符串集合。The first example creates a class called `MyData` that is a simple string collection. [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#8)] 下面的示例将绑定对象到`MyData`。The following example binds the object of an to `MyData`. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#7)] [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#6)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#9)] 下图显示上一示例中创建的控件。The following illustration shows the control created in the previous example. ![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox")![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox") 下面的示例演示如何以填充使用属性。The following example demonstrates how to populate an by using the property. 该示例将添加以下不同类型的项到:The example adds the following different types of items to the : - 一个字符串。A string. - 对象。A object. - 对象。A object. - A包含其他控件对象。A control that contains other objects. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)] 下图显示在前面的示例中创建。The following illustration shows the created in the previous example. ![使用四种类型的内容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "与四种类型的内容的 ListBox")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 下面的示例演示如何使用不同的样式和模板化相关的属性提供的。The following example illustrates how to use the different styling and templating-related properties that are provided by the . 在此示例将绑定到的集合`Task`对象。The in this example is bound to a collection of `Task` objects. 为便于演示，本示例中的样式和模板都进行了内联声明。For demonstration purposes, the styles and templates in this example are all declared inline. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#ItemsControlProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemscontrolproperties)] 呈现时下, 图是该示例的屏幕快照。The following illustration is a screenshot of the example when it is rendered. ![ItemsControl 示例屏幕快照](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl 示例屏幕快照")![ItemsControl example screenshot](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl example screenshot") 两个其他样式相关的属性，不会显示如下和。Two other style-related properties of the that are not shown here are and .

summary.span: 获取或设置 中的交替项容器的数目，该控件可使交替容器具有唯一外观。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of alternating item containers in the , which enables alternating containers to have a unique appearance.

value.span: 中交替项容器的数目。

span.span: The number of alternating item containers in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性使您能够指定两个或多个交替项容器的外观。The and properties enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating item containers. 例如，可以指定每个第三个项的交替的背景色。For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third item in an . 分配给每个项容器中。The is assigned to each item container in the . 从 0 开始的、 递增时才执行减 1 和 0 然后重新启动。 begins at 0, increments until it is minus 1, and then restarts at 0. 例如，如果为 3 中的七项下, 表列出每个项。For example, if is 3 and there are seven items in the , the following table lists the for each item. |中的项位置 Position of Item in the || |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |11|00| |22|11| |33|22| |44|00| |55|11| |66|22| |77|00| 有多种方法可用于指定不同的外观的交替项容器。There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating item containers. 一种方法是将绑定到的项容器的属性。One method is to bind properties of the items container to the . 然后，可以使用来指定应将哪个值应用到具有特定的项容器值。You can then use an to specify which value should be applied to the item container that has a certain value. 你可以使用触发器来根据的值的项容器的属性的值更改其。You can also use triggers to change the value of an item container's property depending on the value of its . ## Examples 下面的示例指定(其继承自) 具有交替项容器 (类型)，并指定不同的背景和前景为每个。The following example specifies that the (which inherits from ) has alternating item containers (which are of type ) and specifies a different background and foreground for each one. 该示例将绑定和属性设置为并提供每个属性。The example binds the and properties to the and provides an for each property. [!code-xaml[AlternationIndexSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AlternationIndexSnippets/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] 下面的示例通过使用来执行与上述示例相同对象。The following example does the same as the previous example by using objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是一种简单的方法来定义的默认模板，介绍如何显示数据对象。This property is a simple way to define a default template that describes how to display the data objects. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 在下面的示例中，静态资源名为`places`指一套`Place`对象，其中的每个`Place`对象具有`CityName`属性和`State`属性。In the following example, the static resource named `places` is defined as a collection of `Place` objects, in which each `Place` object has a `CityName` property and a `State` property. 前缀`src`映射到命名空间中的数据源`Places`定义。The prefix `src` is mapped to the namespace where the data source `Places` is defined. 前缀`scm`和`dat`映射到和命名空间，分别。The prefixes `scm` and `dat` are mapped to the and namespaces, respectively. 下面的示例创建数据集合，它按状态分组并按城市名称排序的视图。The following example creates a view of the data collection that is sorted by the city name and grouped by the state. [!code-xaml[CollectionViewSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CollectionViewSource/CS/window1.xaml#1)] 该视图可以是绑定源，如以下示例所示。The view can be a binding source, as in the following example. 由于指定，每个`Place`对象还会显示其`CityName`值。Because of the specified , each`Place` object is shown with its `CityName` value. 如果未指定，并且没有任何，则基础集合 （在此情况下，"SDKSample.Place"） 中显示的字符串表示形式的每个对象。If is not specified and there is no , then the displays a string representation of each object in the underlying collection (in this case, "SDKSample.Place"). [!code-xaml[CollectionViewSource#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CollectionViewSource/CS/window1.xaml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引 0 处的项描述顶级组，索引 1 处的项描述下一个级别，依次类推。The entry at index 0 describes the top-level groups, the entry at index 1 describes the next level, and so on. 如果存在于集合中的项的更多级别的分组，最后一项适用于的额外级别。If there are more levels of grouping than entries in the collection, the last entry is used for the extra levels. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreGroupStyleObjects**OneOrMoreGroupStyleObjects* 一个或多个对象。One or more objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示，它绑定到和包含用于添加和删除分组的逻辑的代码隐藏内容。The following examples show an that is bound to an and the code-behind content that contains the logic to add and remove grouping. 当复选框已选中，则内容按分组`Type`属性。When the check box is checked, the content of the is grouped by the `Type` attribute. 每个组是类型。Each group is of type . ，以便它都显示为指定显示每个组。The is specified so that it appears as a that displays the of each the group. 在这种情况下，是`Work`或`Home`。In this case, the is either `Work` or `Home`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`、属性指定是否这种情况可确定是否中选择一项。When the property is set to `true`, the property specifies whether the case determines whether an item is selected in an . 例如，如果包含仅在大小写不同，如"项目"和"item"，第一个字符串始终会选择，无论输入的大小写的两个字符串。For example, if an contain two strings that differ only in case, such as "ITEM" and "item", the first string will always be selected, regardless of the case of the input. ## Examples 下面的示例创建包含字符串、"DOG"、"CAT"、"dog"和"cat"。The following example creates a that contains the strings, "DOG", "CAT", "dog", and "cat". 该示例将绑定属性属性。The example binds the property to the property of a . 如果选中此复选框和用户"dog"，类型中的第三个项选择。If the check box is selected and the user types "dog", the third item in the is selected. 如果用户取消选中的复选框和类型"dog"，因为大小写并不搜索的条件，则选择的第一项。If the user unselects the check box and types "dog", the first item is selected because case is not a condition of the search. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将设置属性，每个项容器获取具有相同对象，以作为，但如描述绑定中的数据的属性和，是特定于每个项目中的数据。When you set the property, each item container gets a that has the same objects as the , but the properties that describe the data in the bindings, such as and , are specific to the data for each item in the . 你必须访问项容器的执行操作，如验证数据和错误检查的项。You must access the item container's to perform operations such as validate the data and check for errors on an item. ## Examples 下面的示例是提示用户输入多个客户，并将销售代表分配给每个客户的应用程序的一部分，然后检查销售代表和客户属于同一区域。The following example is part of an application that prompts the user to enter multiple customers and assign a sales representative to each customer, and then checks that the sales representative and the customer belong to the same region. 该示例设置的因此， `AreasMatch`，将验证每个项。The example sets the of the so the , `AreasMatch`, will validate each item. 此示例还创建显示验证错误。The example also creates a that displays validation errors. 请注意，的绑定到从它获取属性。Notice that the of the is bound to a that it gets from the property. 值是有错误的项容器。The value of is the item container that has the error. [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#ItemBindingGroup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window2.xaml#itembindinggroup)] [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidationAdornerSiteFor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window2.xaml#validationadornersitefor)] 下面的示例获取项目容器并调用对容器的以验证数据。The following example gets the item container and calls on the container's to validate the data. 你必须在项目容器上调用的方法来验证数据，而不的。You must validate the data by calling a method on the item container's , not on the of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可能用于将项添加到。This property may be used to add items to an . 添加到子对象隐式将其添加到为对象。Adding a child to an object implicitly adds it to the for the object. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅在中设置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通过集合语法所示，或通过访问的集合对象，并使用它的各种方法，如`Add`。This property can only be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] via the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as `Add`. 要访问集合对象本身的属性是只读的并且集合本身为读写。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only, and the collection itself is read-write. 请注意，使用任一或属性来指定应该用于生成的内容的集合你。Note that you use either the or the property to specify the collection that should be used to generate the content of your . 当设置属性，集合写入只读的和更改的固定大小。When the property is set, the collection is made read-only and fixed-size. 当正在使用，设置属性`null`移除集合并还原使用情况与，后者将是一个空。When is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to , which will be an empty . ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreElements**OneOrMoreElements* 一个或多个对象。One or more objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示将数据绑定到。The following examples demonstrate binding data to an . 第一个示例创建一个名为类`MyData`，它是一个简单字符串集合。The first example creates a class called `MyData` that is a simple string collection. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#7)] [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#6)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#9)] 下图显示上一示例中创建的控件。The following illustration shows the control created in the previous example. ![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox")![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox") 下面的示例演示如何以填充使用属性。The following example demonstrates how to populate an by using the property. 该示例将添加以下不同类型的项到:The example adds the following different types of items to the : - 一个字符串。A string. - 对象。A object. - 对象。A object. - A包含其他控件对象。A control that contains other objects. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)] 下图显示在前面的示例中创建。The following illustration shows the created in the previous example. ![使用四种类型的内容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "与四种类型的内容的 ListBox")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 请注意，为视图时，因此你可以使用如排序、 筛选和分组视图相关的功能。Note that the is a view, so you can use the view-related functionalities such as sorting, filtering, and grouping. 例如，如果你有的实例， `myListBox`，你可以执行以下操作来的内容进行排序。For example, if you have an instance of a , `myListBox`, you can do the following to sort the content of the . 在此示例中，`Content`是要作为排序依据的属性的名称。In this example, `Content` is the name of the property to sort by. [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSnippet#ListBoxCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#listboxct)] 或者，你可以执行以下操作来实现相同的结果。Alternatively, you can do the following to achieve the same results. 在这种情况下，创建由指定的基于内容的项的布局面板。In this case, the creates the panel for the layout of the items based on what is specified by the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用指定的数据对象的可视化效果。You use the to specify the visualization of the data objects. 如果你绑定到集合对象，并且您不提供使用的特定显示说明，生成[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的每个项是基础集合中每个对象的字符串表示。If your is bound to a collection object and you do not provide specific display instructions using a , the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of each item is a string representation of each object in the underlying collection. 当你将设置上、 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] ，如下所示生成 (使用作为示例):When you set an on an , the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] is generated as follows (using the as an example): 1. 在内容生成过程启动请求创建每个数据项的容器。During content generation, the initiates a request for the to create a container for each data item. 有关，容器是。For , the container is a . 生成器回调到以准备该容器。The generator calls back into the to prepare the container. 2. 准备工作的一部分涉及到将复制的的要的。Part of the preparation involves the copying of the of the to be the of the . 3. 类似于所有类型，的包含。Similar to all types, the of a contains a . 当应用该模板时，它将创建其绑定到的。When the template is applied, it creates a whose is bound to the of the . 4. 最后，适用的到其自身，并创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Finally, the applies that to itself, and that creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 如果你有多个定义，并且你想要提供逻辑来以编程方式选择并应用，使用属性。If you have more than one defined and you want to supply logic to programmatically choose and apply a , use the property.
